about_the_game: Relic Hunt is an exciting clicker game where every click earns coins and offers a chance to obtain valuable items necessary for collection sets. As you progress and achieve new milestones, the collections unlock unique features and enhance your stats. The game also includes mini-games, such as poker, where players can compete against each other by betting their earned coins. Collect sets, participate in mini-games, and expand your collection of unique items!
